classes.name: BBjLDAPSearchResult
classes.docu: In BBj 11.00 and higher, BBjLDAPSearchResult provides a data structure for holding information about the result of processing a search request. This includes the list of BBjLDAPEntry objects, one for each matching result. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPSearchResult/BBjLDAPSearchResult.htm)

methods.name: getSearchEntries
methods.docu:
In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method returns a list of the entries that 
 match the search criteria used to generate the BBjLDAPSearchResult object.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPSearchResult/bbjldapsearchresult_getsearchentries.htm)

methods.name: getEntryCount
methods.docu:
In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method returns the number of entries that 
 matched the search criteria use to generate the BBjLDAPSearchResult object.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPSearchResult/bbjldapsearchresult_getentrycount.htm)

classes.name: BBjLDAPEntry
classes.docu: Contains the information for a single entry in an LDAP directory. These objects are retrieved using a search query (see BBjLDAPConnection::search). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPEntry/bbjldapentry.htm)

methods.name: addAttribute
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method adds an attribute and its value to the entry.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPEntry/bbjldapentry_addattribute.htm)

methods.name: addAttribute
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method adds an attribute and its value to the entry.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPEntry/bbjldapentry_addattribute.htm)

methods.name: getAttributeNames
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns a list of the available attributes on the entry.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPEntry/bbjldapentry_getattributenames.htm)

methods.name: getAttributeValue
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the value for the specified attribute.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPEntry/bbjldapentry_getattributevalue.htm)

methods.name: getAttributeValues
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns a list of the values for the specified attribute.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPEntry/bbjldapentry_getattributevalues.htm)

methods.name: getDN
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the distinguished name (DN) for the location of the entry.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPEntry/bbjldapentry_getDN.htm)

classes.name: BBjLDAPConnection
classes.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, BBjLDAPConnection provides access to an LDAP or Active Directory server and the information it contains. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPConnection/BBjLDAPConnection.htm)

methods.name: bind
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method reconnects and authenticates the user with the LDAP server.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPConnection/bbjldapconnection_bind.htm)

methods.name: close
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method closes and unbinds a connection to the LDAP server.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPConnection/bbjldapconnection_close.htm)

methods.name: search
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method executes an LDAP search query on the LDAP server and returns a list of the entries that match the search criteria.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/b3odbc/BBjLDAPConnection/bbjldapconnection_search.htm)
